titleStmt.title: An occasionall discourse, upon an accident which befell his Maiesty in hunting. Composed in Italian, by Francis Cevolus, and thence translated into English
Discorso d'un caso seguito à Sua Maestà nella caccia. English
titleStmt.author: Cevoli, Francesco.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Norton, for Robert Bird, at the Bible in St. Laurence-lane,

notesStmt.note: English translation followed by Italian text with separate dated title page with imprint: In Londra, nella stamperia di Giovanni Norton, 1635. Register is continuous, with separate pagination.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
